particleSystem
Class Path

java.lang.Object
  particleSystem.Path

public class Path
extends java.lang.Object

The Path the Particles can follow.
a Path is a series of connected particles. They interact with the Repellers and so... based on: Daniel Shiffman's Nature of Code

Author:
fabianthelbind

private  java.util.ArrayList<Particle> ptclPoints
          A Path is an ArrayList of Particles (PVector objects)
private  float radius
          A path has a radius, i.e how far is it ok for the particle to wander off

resetPointPtcls

public void resetPointPtcls()
makes the points of the path move back to their origin if this is not called within every loop of the draw() the points of the path behave like normal Particle
